Texts.Eng: Telebrium Equipment

Texts.Chs: 钛合金设备
Texts.Eng: Titanium Equipment

Texts.Chs: 北京三角电子设备有限公司

Texts.Chs: Tritanium Equipment
Texts.Eng: Tritanium Equipment

Texts.Eng: Tungsten Equipment

Texts.Chs: 超级武器
Texts.Eng: Vel'uuish Weapons

Texts.Chs: 北京维奥利姆设备有限公司
Texts.Eng: Violium Equipment

Texts.Chs: 武器和装甲锻造
Texts.Eng: Weapons and Armor Forging

Texts.Chs: 深圳市西斯瑞克特设备有限公司
Texts.Eng: Xithricite Equipment

Texts.Chs: Zerchesium Equipment
Texts.Eng: Zerchesium Equipment

Texts.Chs: 用骨头制造武器和盔甲是相当简单的，至少相比金属加工。你现在可以用手工雕刻各种有用的骨头为基础的设备。他们可能不如金属好，但他们肯定击败棍子和石头。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

Fashioning weapons and armor out of bone is pretty simple, at least compared to metalworking. You can now carve a variety of useful bone-based equipment by hand. They might not be as good as metal, but they sure beat sticks and stones.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学会了制造武器和盔甲的基本知识。你现在可以在你的加工桌上创建一个军械库，在那里你可以用很多材料制造各种各样的电子兵器、盔甲和武器。在那里，你现在可以用简单的金属如铁制造各种基本的盔甲和装备。注意: 虽然旧的铁砧仍然可用，但它在功能上基本上已经被军械库所取代。你不再有真正的理由去制造一个。
第二层它看起来相当恶心，但是通过一些聪明的工程技术，你可以形成可以用作武器或盔甲的固体粘液。不要争论。接受现实吧。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

It might seem pretty gross, but with some clever engineering you could form solid slime capable of being used as weapons or armor. Don't argue. Just accept.

Texts.Chs: 第二层现在你可以把卢纳里锻造成一个普通的形式，你可以把它武器化。你现在可以创建大量基于 lunari 的设备。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Now that you can forge Lunari into a usuable form, you can weaponize it. You can now create a large amount of Lunari-based gear.

Texts.Chs: 第二层 Elduu 种族几乎所有东西都使用水晶。闪闪发光，美不胜收。你已经学会了模仿这种风格，并且可以自己制造这种武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

The Elduu race use crystals for most everything. Gleaming and beautiful. You've learned to mimic that style and can make such weapons on your own.

Texts.Chs: 超级战士第二级: 超级战士用黄金和暗黑晶体组成的种族合金，制造出重型但耐用的武器。你已经学会了模仿这种风格，并且可以自己制造这种武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

The Vel'uuish race alloys gold with Duskiline crystals, creating heavy but surprisingly durable weaponry. You've learned to mimic that style and can make such weapons on your own.

Texts.Chs: 第二层你已经学会了如何最好地利用 Telebrium 在创造轻量级，毒药为主题的武器和盔甲。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned how best to utilize Telebrium in the creation of lightweight, poison-themed weapons and armor.

Texts.Chs: 第二层你已经学会了如何最好地应用棉花和塑料聚合物来创造舒适和有用的盔甲，当你在大气层中的时候会非常有帮助。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned how to best apply cotton and plastic polymers in the creation of comfortable and useful armor that will be quite helpful when you're in atmosphere.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学会了制造更好的 EPPs，它可以改进基本的呼吸模式或者做其他有用的事情，比如抵抗元素或者提高你的战斗能力。提醒: 在 Frackin 的宇宙中，EPPs 和香草有很大的不同！没有一个 EPP 适用于所有的情况，你选择的 EPP 类型应该适合你想要探索的星球。
第二层你已经学会了 Kirhos 的武器制造风格——原始力量凌驾于一切之上是他们的哲学。Kirhos 能量枪非常强大，但容易过热。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned the Kirhos style of weaponmaking - raw power over all else is their philosophy. Kirhos energy guns are very powerful, but prone to overheating.

Texts.Chs: 第三层先进合金采取所有最好的部分，其组成部分，并结合起来成为一个金属。虽然它的武器和装甲往往相当笨重，但在战斗中进行测试时，它们非常棒。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Advanced Alloy takes all the best parts of its components and combines them together into one metal. While its weapons and armor tend to be rather bulky, they are fantastic when put to test in combat.

Texts.Chs: 第三层: 虽然原型能很好地传导能量，但是制造近战武器有点太软了。尽管如此，它作为一个赞美的范围武器和某些盔甲，你现在可以创建。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Although Protocite conducts energy well, it is a bit too soft to make melee weapons. Still, it is fantastic as a compliment to ranged weapons and certain armors, which you can now create.

Texts.Chs: 第三层在武器制造方面，虫族采用了钨的最好的部分，并把它们带到了极致。耐用且超耐热，可用于制造大量强力武器和盔甲。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

In terms of weaponmaking, Zerchesium takes the best parts of Tungsten and takes them to the extreme. Durable and super heat resistant, it can be used in the creation of a huge amount of potent weapons and armor.

Texts.Chs: 第3层不太重，对伤害的抵抗力很强，钛可以用在各种各样的武器和盔甲上，现在可以用在你的创造物上。你可以制造各种比钨更好的武器和盔甲。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Not too heavy and very resistant to damage, Titanium sees use in all sorts of weapons and armor which are now available for your creation. You can make a variety of weapons and armor that are better than Tungsten.

Texts.Chs: 第三层半影是一种强有力的金属，具有比钛更好的锋利边缘，使其成为许多武器的理想选择。它与银合金特别好，创造一个独特的武器风格，通过所有元素电阻造成普遍伤害。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Penumbrite is a potent metal that holds a sharp edge better than Titanium, making it ideal in many weapons. It alloys with Silver especially well, creating a unique style of weapon that deals universal damage through all elemental resistances.

Texts.Chs: 利用你对复杂织造的知识，你可以使用丝和类似质量的纤维创造更强大的纺织为基础的盔甲，既实用又时尚。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Using your knowledge of complex weaving, you can create more powerful textile-based armors that are both practical and fashionable using silk and similar-quality fibres.

Texts.Chs: 第三层防护镀层，碳是非常耐用，耐元素和非常轻的重量。你已经学会了应用它来创建强大的盔甲。随着你武器制造技能的增长，镀碳将成为许多武器和装甲的基础。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

When worked into defensive plating, Carbon is extremely durable, resistant to elements and very light-weight. You've learned to apply it to the creation of powerful armors. As your skill with weaponmaking grows, Carbon Plating will be the basis of many weapons and armor down the line.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你可以制造更好的电子商务环保产品，这些产品可以提供更多的功能，并比以前更好地履行现有的职责。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You can make even better EPPs which serve more functions and perform existing roles better than before.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经学会了在更先进的伪造武器，盔甲和特别有用的呼吸 EPP 创造钨钢工作。除了一般相当持久的时候，正确锻造钨也有热耐受性，开始制造有用的能源武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to work Tungsten like steel in the creation of more advanced forged weapons, armors, and the especially useful ^orange;Breathing EPP^reset;. Besides being generally quite durable when forged correctly, Tungsten also has the heat tolerance to start making useful energy weapons.

Texts.Chs: 通过将你的生物学知识应用到武器制造中，你已经制造出了各种各样的武器，它们不仅看起来是活的，而且绝对是活生生的、会呼吸的谋杀装置。虽然它们的合法性值得怀疑，但它们确实是杀人的好工具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

By applying your knowledge of biology to weapon creation, you've made a variety of weapons that don't just seem to be alive, but are definitely living, breathing murder devices. Though dubiously legal, they are excellent for killing stuff.

Texts.Chs: 众所周知，Tier 4 Durasteel 是为真空环境量身定做的，因为它有着惊人的平滑凹痕和切口的能力，假设任何东西都足够强大到可以划伤它。不出所料，它是一种很好的金属，可以用来制造盔甲和武器——你现在已经可以用“更容易”的金属进行艰苦的练习了。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Durasteel is known to be tailor-made for use in a vacuum because of its amazing ability to smooth dents and cuts, assuming anything is strong enough to scratch it. Unsurprisingly, it is a great metal to make armor and weapons out of - something you now have the skill to do after much painstaking practice with 'easier' metals.

Texts.Chs: 第4层比其组成杜拉斯蒂尔更耐用，Tritanium 是非常轻，非常耐用，非常抵抗恶劣环境。Tritanium 制造的装甲是最容易获得的保护来源之一，可以抵御天然气巨头内部的致命压力，而它的武器是可靠的，具有极大的破坏性。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Even more durable than its constituent Durasteel, Tritanium is very light, very durable, and very resistant to hostile environments. Armor made from Tritanium is among the most readily available source of protection from the ^red;lethal pressure^reset; within gas giants, while its weapons are reliable and very destructive.

Texts.Chs: 第四层由于其闪闪发光的霓虹灯外观，受到所有可爱东西的爱好者的青睐，Prisilite 在制造战斗装备方面是一块非常便利的晶体。如果你愿意的话，汽水甚至可以作为奖励！
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Favored by lovers of all things cute for its sparkly, neon appearance, Prisilite is nontheless a very handy crystal in making combat equipment. The sparkling might even be a bonus if you're so inclined!

Texts.Chs: 第4层它看起来相当恶心，但是通过一些聪明的工程技术，你可以形成可以用作武器或盔甲的固体粘液。不要争论。接受现实吧。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

It might seem pretty gross, but with some clever engineering you could form solid slime capable of being used as weapons or armor. Don't argue. Just accept.

Texts.Chs: 第四层不仅 Irradium 比普通同位素更耐用，而且它的辐射能够独特地在一定程度上得到控制。如果处理得当，只有在施加压力的情况下，Irradium 才会经历致命的放射性，这样就可以制造出在打击敌人时可以发射的武器，但是储存起来后就不会慢慢失效。这是一个伟大的方式给你的敌人癌症在他们死前的最后时刻。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Not only is Irradium far more durable than common isotopes, but its radiation can, uniquely, be contained to an extent. When treated correctly, Irradium will only undergo its deadly radioactive decay when pressure is applied to it, allowing for the creation of weapons that 'discharge' when striking foes but won't slowly fizzle out when stored. It's all around a great way to give your foes cancer in their last moments before death.

Texts.Chs: 现在你已经学会了浓缩同位素，你可以把它们用在有用的武器上。曾经被贫铀的子弹击中吗？我不建议你这么做。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Now that you've learned to enrich isotopes, you can put them to use in useful weapons. Ever gotten shot by a depleted uranium bullet? I wouldn't recommend it.

Texts.Chs: 第四层金属 Quietus 是一种奇怪的、剧毒的物质，不知何故，它看起来几乎是活的。很少有金属拥有像 Quietus 一样锋利的边缘，使其在近战武器中非常出色。它也相当强大的盔甲和弹道武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Quietus metal is a strange, highly poisonous substance that almost seems to be alive, somehow. Few metals hold a sharp edge like Quietus, making it great in melee weapons. It's also quite potent in armors and ballistic weapons.

Texts.Chs: 三角形无论在什么情况下都会自然地形成三角形，这意味着它可以用在一些非常尖锐的工具上。它也是处理原子和亚原子粒子的关键材料，因此在能源武器方面也很重要。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

The natural tendency of Trianglium to form into triangles no matter the circumstance means that it can be used in some very pointy implements. It is also a critical material in handling atomic and subatomic particles, so it's great in energy weapons as well.

Texts.Chs: 第四层你可以制造出极好的电子致幻剂，它可以完全消除敌对气氛，甚至提供更多的实用性。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can make extremely good EPPs which can completely neutralize hostile atmospheres and provide even more utility.

Texts.Chs: 第4层你已经非常擅长塑造有机材料，现在可以锻造各种以蜜蜂和蜂蜜为主题的盔甲和武器硬琥珀。(当然不是用手!)
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've gotten very good at shaping organic materials, and can now forge hard amber into a variety of bee and honey-themed armors and weapons. (Not by hand, of course!)

Texts.Chs: 你的织布技术是无人能及的。你可以使最好的非金属盔甲可用，也学会了与怪物电镀工作，以创建强大的有机盔甲。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Your skill in weaving is matched by few. You can make the best non-metallic armors available and have also learned to work with monster plating to create powerful organic armor.

Texts.Chs: 第五层法国是奇怪的和难以伪造的，因为它的趋势分阶段进出存在，但它是致命的阴影元素的少数来源之一。凭借你的技能，你可以轻而易举地操作它，将它用在一些相当可怕的武器上。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Effigium is strange and hard to forge because of its tendency to phase in and out of existence, but it is one of the few sources of the deadly Shadow element. With your skill, you can handle it with ease, putting it to use in some quite fearsome weaponry.

Texts.Chs: 第5层它可能看起来很恶心，但是通过一些聪明的工程技术，你可以形成可以用作武器或盔甲的固体粘液。不要争论。接受现实吧。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

It might seem pretty gross, but with some clever engineering you could form solid slime capable of being used as weapons or armor. Don't argue. Just accept.

Texts.Chs: 第5层现在你已经学会了合金 Aegisalt，Violium 和 Ferozium，你可以把这种合金工作在装甲和武器，超过其组成的晶体大幅度的优势。虽然非常重，致密合金设备是其中最好的。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Now that you've learned to alloy Aegisalt, Violium and Ferozium, you can put that alloy to work in armor and weapons that surpass its component crystals by a wide margin. Though very heavy, Dense Alloy equipment is among the best.

Texts.Chs: 第5层你已经学会与强有力的晶体埃伊萨尔特一起工作，以创造奇妙的武器和盔甲。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You've learned to work with the potent crystal Aegisalt to create fantastic weapons and armor.

Texts.Chs: 第5层你已经学会了使用强力水晶 Ferozium 来制造奇妙的武器和盔甲。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You've learned to work with the potent crystal Ferozium to create fantastic weapons and armor.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学会了使用强大的水晶中央琴来制造神奇的武器和盔甲。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You've learned to work with the potent crystal Violium to create fantastic weapons and armor.

Texts.Chs: 第6层作为自然界中最重、最坚不可摧的金属，唯一比寻找 Densinium 矿脉更难的就是锻造它。尽管如此，你已经成功地完成了这个艰巨的壮举，制造出了近乎坚不可摧、难以置信的强力盔甲和武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

As the heaviest and most generally indestructible metal found naturally, the only thing harder than finding veins of Densinium is forging it. Nonetheless, you've succeeded at this Herculean feat, creating nigh-indestructible and unbelievably powerful armor and weapons.

Texts.Chs: 第6层以其在任何时候都极其灼热的倾向而闻名，除虫菊对它的使用者和敌人一样危险... ... 除了你以外的任何人都是使用者。凭借你的技能，你可以制造出现存最热门的武器和盔甲，这不仅可以让你的竞争对手焦头烂额，而且可以保护你免受银河系最严寒的侵袭。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Famed for its tendency to be blazingly hot at all times, Pyreite is as much a danger to its user as it is to foes... were that user anyone but you. With your skill, you can create the hottest weapons and armor in existence, which will not only fry the competition to a crisp but protect you from the worst cold the galaxy has to offer.

Texts.Chs: 第六层日光浴室是银河系中已知的少数几种比 Irradium 具有更强放射性的东西之一，而且它对靴子具有极强的耐热性。尽管这些障碍与日光浴工作，你不可思议的技能已使武器化它彻底容易。你可以用日光浴室制造出奇妙的，致命的武器和盔甲。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Solarium is one of the few things known to the galaxy that is more radioactive than Irradium, and it's extremely heat-resistant to boot. Despite these barriers to working with Solarium, your incredible skill has made weaponizing it downright easy. You can make fantastic, lethal weapons and armor out of Solarium.

Texts.Chs: 第6层事实上，Isogen 不停地吞噬所有的热量，并且不知何故保持在绝对零度以上，这提出了一个有趣的两难问题: 你如何锻造和处理这样的东西？好吧，你已经用你聪明的铁匠大脑算出来了，你可以制造出现存最冷的武器和盔甲。它们不仅可以把你的敌人冻成固体，而且 Isogen 盔甲可以让你潜入熔岩的海洋，出来时也不会有任何损伤。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

The fact that Isogen ceaseslessly devours all heat, and somehow remains just above absolute zero, presents an interesting dilemma: how do you forge and work with something like that? Well, you've figured it out with your smart blacksmith brain, and can create the coldest weapons and armor in existence. Not only will they freeze your foes solid, but Isogen armor will let you dive into an ocean of lava and come out no worse for wear.

Texts.Chs: 第6层锡锂辉石是唯一已知的自然辐射宇宙能量的晶体。它可以用于制造许多荒谬的致命武器和令人惊讶的耐用盔甲，现在你有了这样做的技能和诀窍。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Xithricite is the only known crystal which naturally radiates Cosmic energy. It can be used in the creation of many absurdly deadly weapons and amazingly durable armors now that you have the know-how and skill to do so.

Texts.Chs: 第6层你已经掌握了 EPP 创作的艺术，可以制作出最好的 EPP。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've mastered the art of EPP creation and can make the best EPPs around.

Texts.Chs: 第7层虽然你最近才发现了你所谓的 Aetherium 合金，但你已经开始着手制造人类已知的最好的武器和盔甲---- 弗罗兰，以及其他所有武器。你必须和一个可怕的神签订协议才能做得比这更好。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 7^reset;

Though you only recently discovered what you've dubbed 'Aetherium' alloy, you've already set about weaponizing it in the creation of the literal best weapons and armor known to man, Floran, and everything in between. You'd have to make a pact with an eldritch god to do better than this.
